tool_description: Identifies related scriptural passages, parallel texts, and thematic connections to enhance understanding of the primary text through cross-referencing.

primary_reference.description: Main scripture reference to find connections for

search_scope.description: Scope of search: same_book, same_testament, entire_bible

max_references.description: Maximum number of cross-references to return (1-25)

error_messages: Invalid primary reference: Provide a valid biblical reference format.
Invalid search scope: Use one of [same_book, same_testament, entire_bible].
Unsupported connection type: Valid types are [thematic, linguistic, historical, prophetic].
Max references out of range: Must be between 1 and 25.
No cross-references found: No related passages found for the given criteria.
usage: Provide a primary scripture reference and specify search scope and connection types. Returns related passages with explanation of their connections to the primary text.

connection_explanations.description: Explanations of how each reference relates to the primary text

strength_scores.description: Relevance strength scores for each cross-reference
